title: '[FEATURE] '

---

## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case

Describe the problem this feature would solve or the value it would add.

**Example scenario:**
"As a [user type], I want to [do something] so that [benefit]."

## Proposed Solution

How you envision this feature working (optional).

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative solutions or features you've considered (optional).

## Additional Context

- Would this work well with existing features?
- Are there similar features in other projects?
- Any technical considerations?

## Implementation Ideas

If you have ideas about how this could be implemented (optional):
- Which files/modules would be affected?
- What dependencies might be needed?
- Estimated complexity?
